title: Dark Knight Vocalizations
description: A collection of dark knight vocalizations, contains 225 sound effects, including battle, pain and neutral vocalizations, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/dark-knight-vocalizations

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/tin6dokusxwehc5/MSE%20-%20Dark%20Knight%20Vocalizations_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


The Dark Knight is a forsaken warrior who deserves neither the forces of Light nor the forces of Darkness. He is true only to himself and his purpose. This creature is two and a half meters tall, wielding mighty strength and black magic.

All of its qualities formed the basis of the creature's creation and vocalization design.


The collection contains 15 voice actions, including 225 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 25 voice sounds during an attack
  • 15 battle shouts
  • 10 coughs
  • 25 deaths
  • 10 exert and effort sounds
  • 5 exhale sounds
  • 10 groans
  • 25 growls
  • 10 jumps and actions
  • 10 laughs
  • 25 pains
  • 20 roars
  • 10 snarling sounds
  • 10 snorting and grunting sounds
  • 15 victory shouts


Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs.


This package is ideal for creating large monster and boss voices: demon, devil, mutant, giant, titan, guardian, dark warrior, golem, elemental and more.


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, post-apocalyptic, sci-fi, horror or any other where monsters live and roar.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 225 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 15 voice actions
  • 110 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 70 voice samples of the pain type
  • 45 neutral type voice samples
  • great for game scenes, animations and trailers


Number of Audio Waves: 225

Number of Audio Cues: 225

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 07 minutes 40 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
